Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Object2D
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FireTrap, Humanoid, Tile

    public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements Object2D
    This class implements object2D since we want our game objects to use those methods specified, such as intersects and getBoundingRectangle.
